tasks.task: Pruning stone fruits and tree fruits
subtasks: Check the weather forecast before pruning
Identify the type of tree growth (fruiting on old or new wood)
Remove lower growth to deter deer
Control tree size to prevent shading other plants
Thin out clusters of buds on cherry trees
Limit one-year-old wood growth on peaches
Thin peaches to desired quantity per tree
Space branches to increase airflow and prevent disease
Select new branches for future fruit production
Summer prune trees to remove crisscrossing branches
Remove damaged, diseased, or dead wood
